body: Serpentfolk cherish knowledge—and hence know how valuable obscuring the truth can be.
name: Serpentfolk Illusionist

sections.other_gear: mwk dagger, amulet of natural armor +1, ring of protection +1, spellbook, 273 gp
sections.languages: Abyssal, Aklo, Common, Draconic, Elven, Undercommon; telepathy 100 ft.

spells.spell-like abilities:
(CL 4th; concentration +8)

At will-disguise self (DC 15, humanoid form only), ventriloquism (DC 15)

1/day-blur, dominate person (DC 19), major image (DC 17), mirror image, suggestion (DC 17)

spells.illusionist spells prepared:
(CL 4th; concentration +10)

2nd-blindness/deafness (DC 18), detect thoughts (DC 18), illusion of calm (DC 19), invisibility, pernicious poison

1st-color spray (2, DC 18), hypnotism (DC 18), shield, silent image (DC 18), vanish

0 (at will)-dancing lights, detect magic, mage hand, read magic

Opposition Schools conjuration, evocation

sections.feats: Combat Casting, Improved Initiative, Scribe Scroll, Spell Focus (enchantment), Spell Focus (illusion), Toughness

sections.body: During Combat A serpentfolk illusionist seeks to deceive opponents with spells until it can debilitate them with blindness/deafness, color spray, or a venomous bite enhanced with pernicious poison . Otherwise, it attacks with its wand or uses suggestion and dominate person to turn enemies into allies.

sections.body: Bite—injury; save Fort DC 17; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1d2 Str; cure 2 saves. The save DC is Constitution-based.
sections.name: Poison
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Serpentfolk/Example Serpentfolk/Serpentfolk Illusionist/Serpentfolk Illusionist/Special Abilities/Poison

sections.body: A serpentfolk illusionist has greatly enhanced its racial gifts for deception with decades of intensive arcane study. On the surface world, it is often the leader of a group of serpentfolk or a cult of lesser reptilian humanoids.

sections.name: Serpentfolk Illusionist
